price: No he destruido una ciudad [que estuviera condenada] hasta que le llegara su término prefijado.
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā walahā kitābun maʿlūmun
